UniprotID	Q96BA8
Accession	Q96BA8;Q8N2D5;Q96CP0
EntryName	CR3L1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Cyclic AMP-responsive element-binding protein 3-like protein 1 (cAMP-responsive element-binding protein 3-like protein 1) (Old astrocyte specifically-induced substance) (OASIS) [Cleaved into: Processed cyclic AMP-responsive element-binding protein 3-like protein 1]
GeneName	CREB3L1 OASIS PSEC0238
Length	519
Function	Precursor of the transcription factor form (Processed cyclic AMP-responsive element-binding protein 3-like protein 1), which is embedded in the endoplasmic reticulum membrane with N-terminal DNA-binding and transcription activation domains oriented toward the cytosolic face of the membrane (PubMed:12054625, PubMed:16417584, PubMed:25310401). In response to ER stress or DNA damage, transported to the Golgi, where it is cleaved in a site-specific manner by resident proteases S1P/MBTPS1 and S2P/MBTPS2. The released N-terminal cytosolic domain is translocated to the nucleus where it activates transcription of specific target genes involved in the cell-cycle progression inhibition (PubMed:12054625, PubMed:21767813, PubMed:25310401).
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane; Nucleus
Disorder	0.4256,0.4441,0.3599,0.2292,0.3182,0.3566,0.3807,0.3983,0.2988,0.2503,0.2918,0.2575,0.2470,0.2849,0.2752,0.3566,0.3566,0.3149,0.4476,0.3019,0.2541,0.2470,0.2680,0.3117,0.4119,0.2680,0.2918,0.3215,0.3182,0.3599,0.4476,0.4256,0.3840,0.3840,0.3948,0.4831,0.4369,0.4330,0.4582,0.3321,0.4409,0.5296,0.5419,0.4507,0.3631,0.3667,0.4766,0.3321,0.1969,0.2224,0.3117,0.3249,0.2752,0.3117,0.3249,0.3249,0.3053,0.3356,0.3426,0.2503,0.2884,0.3117,0.2645,0.2752,0.2715,0.4017,0.4017,0.4369,0.5620,0.7505,0.7369,0.5992,0.5807,0.6322,0.7629,0.7369,0.6991,0.5758,0.5758,0.4582,0.5342,0.6375,0.6375,0.6851,0.6136,0.7505,0.7505,0.7505,0.7505,0.6482,0.5254,0.5533,0.5533,0.5176,0.5055,0.5055,0.5342,0.5419,0.6851,0.7120,0.8198,0.7982,0.8198,0.7982,0.8085,0.8125,0.6427,0.5901,0.5098,0.4831,0.5665,0.6375,0.5176,0.5342,0.5456,0.4940,0.4409,0.3631,0.3494,0.3631,0.3704,0.3704,0.3948,0.3983,0.4220,0.3529,0.4051,0.4582,0.5017,0.6227,0.5342,0.5139,0.4979,0.6136,0.7120,0.6851,0.7505,0.7595,0.7982,0.7881,0.7369,0.6806,0.6136,0.5901,0.5577,0.5342,0.6576,0.5382,0.5342,0.5176,0.4256,0.4901,0.5456,0.5017,0.4685,0.4725,0.4330,0.4901,0.4330,0.4831,0.5139,0.5577,0.5577,0.6322,0.6712,0.6906,0.6531,0.6183,0.7250,0.7209,0.7415,0.7505,0.6482,0.6043,0.6576,0.6851,0.7163,0.7163,0.7080,0.7331,0.7120,0.7250,0.5807,0.5296,0.4940,0.4292,0.4119,0.4652,0.4766,0.4801,0.4801,0.3948,0.4652,0.5254,0.5665,0.6322,0.6089,0.6089,0.7289,0.6991,0.7672,0.7672,0.7547,0.8530,0.9106,0.9126,0.9519,0.9503,0.9362,0.9346,0.9230,0.9649,0.9783,0.9756,0.9664,0.9657,0.9649,0.9634,0.9519,0.9519,0.9230,0.9249,0.9329,0.9190,0.9081,0.8991,0.8991,0.8872,0.8872,0.8741,0.7881,0.7881,0.7629,0.7547,0.7881,0.7916,0.6851,0.6576,0.6322,0.6661,0.6482,0.7120,0.6269,0.6043,0.6375,0.6712,0.6620,0.6712,0.7080,0.6227,0.5707,0.5951,0.6043,0.6043,0.6136,0.5901,0.6661,0.7415,0.7415,0.6948,0.5665,0.5296,0.5456,0.6269,0.5211,0.5493,0.4619,0.4901,0.4901,0.4582,0.4541,0.5419,0.5382,0.5382,0.5211,0.4901,0.4901,0.5017,0.4940,0.4685,0.4582,0.5296,0.5493,0.4801,0.4
